content: All the new features that are added in Compound III
name: Compound III Highlights

steps.content: Each Compound III deployment features a single interest-earning base asset, with all other assets serving as collateral. This simplifies the protocol, reduces risk, and potentially improves capital efficiency
steps.name: Introduction

steps.content: Collateral size limits, or supply caps, can be set for each collateral asset
steps.name: Introduction Evaluation

steps.content: The risk management and liquidation engine has been redesigned to increase the safety of the protocol while maintaining liquidator incentives
steps.name: Step 3

steps.content: Supply and borrow interest rate models can be decoupled, giving governance full control over economic policy.
steps.name: Step 4

steps.content: An abstract incentive metric is natively built into the core contract to reward user activity from the protocol's inception. A rewards system is also added on top to provide flexible incentives that can be extended by governance
steps.name: Step 5

choices.content: Reduced risk, and potentially improved capital efficiency
